star.name: Star
star.desc: Buy a ☆ that goes in front of your name and puts you at the top of the user list. It goes away whether you leave for more than one hour or the server restarts.

fullstar.name: Full Star
fullstar.desc: Buy a ★ that goes in front of your name and puts you at the top of the user list. It lasts for four weeks.

title.name: Title
title.desc: Buy a user title for your profile. It can be seen via "/profile username". Check "/profile wolf" for an example.

poof.name: Poof
poof.desc: Buy a poof message to be added into your pool of possible poofs. Poofs are custom leave messages that are used via "/poof".

avatar.name: Avatar
avatar.desc: Buy a custom avatar to be applied to your name. You supply the image. Images larger than 80px by 80px don't show correctly in battles.

joinphrase.name: Join Phrase
joinphrase.desc: Buy a join phrase that the bot submits in the chat every time you join the Lobby.
